description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Fight against the zombies alone or with your friends in this 1-4 multiplayer deathmach while you dispute world best zombiekiller title. Missiles, grenades, energy balls... use what you need to obtain it!
